meanings.definition: The quality or state of being paradoxical.
meanings.sent1: The paradoxicality of the situation left everyone confused.
meanings.sent2: Her speech was filled with paradoxicality, making it hard to understand.
meanings.sent3: The paradoxicality of the magician's tricks entertained the audience.
meanings.sent4: The paradoxicality of the puzzle made it both frustrating and intriguing.
meanings.sent5: The paradoxicality of the concept lingered in their minds long after the discussion.

meanings.definition: The presence of contradictory or seemingly absurd elements within a situation or statement.
meanings.sent1: The paradoxicality of his argument made it hard to follow.
meanings.sent2: The movie's plot was full of paradoxicality, keeping the audience engaged.
meanings.sent3: The paradoxicality of the fashion trend raised eyebrows among the critics.
meanings.sent4: The paradoxicality of the decision left everyone in disbelief.
meanings.sent5: The paradoxicality of the situation added an interesting twist to the story.
